3. **Oversight**: To conduct hearings and investigations to oversee the Executive Branch. This includes scrutinizing presidential nominees and administering government spending.

5. **Committee Service**: Senators typically serve on multiple committees, each focusing  specific policy areas,. Examples of these include agriculture health education armed services foreign relations judiciary commerce science.
